messages.title: Lower taxes for local families
messages.content: Lower taxes for local families says Martin Horwood MP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: More NHS cuts on the way warns MP Martin Horwood. NHS in Gloucestershire is facing real cuts in vital services.
Horwood fights in Parliament for town floods action. Highlighting the need for action from the government to support flood-stricken areas.
Join Horwood’s fairer deal for our troops campaign. Campaigning for better conditions and support for British troops.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Race to be the next MP for our area is still a close fight between current Cheltenham MP Martin Horwood and the Conservative candidate.

issues.defence: Join Horwood’s fairer deal for our troops campaign. Campaigning for better conditions and support for British troops.

community.content: Countryside victory closer say campaigners. Lower taxes for local families says Martin Horwood MP. Bus services under threat from Conservative Council. Health charities get festive boost from MP Martin.

politicalExperience.achievements: Highlighted the flooding risk in Cheltenham.

contactInformation.address: FREEPOST RRSC-RTET-KBSH, 16 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham, GL52 6AA
